metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3847 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An unauthorized access to the execution of the setuid file withcapabilities flaw in the Linux kernel OverlayFS subsystem was found in theway user copying a capable file from a nosuid mount into another mount. Alocal user could use this flaw to escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
